A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Thought this movie was just good the first viewing\, but the more I thought about it the less I liked it.  But after seeing it a second time I liked it so so so much more\, this movie is great\, and if you don't like it the first time\, I highly recommend giving it one more chance\, there are things I don't like\, but the great things about this movie are so great.  It is a different movie for sure\, but it still feels like Star Wars.
